block_comment: The block of Verilog RTL code is responsible for assigning the value of "cke_train_reg" to "cke_train". This is implemented through the use of a continuous assignment statement "assign" which checks for any changes in the value of "cke_train_reg" and promptly assigns any new value to "cke_train". Consequently, this block can be understood as replicating the state of "cke_train_reg" in "cke_train".
